case.title: Pretty, Black Female seeks... (London)
case.text:
...someone new and exciting to talk to! I am so incredibly bored this evening and I'm struggling to sleep. My so called friends and acquaintances are seldom responding to my rather random and albeit strange messages so I thought this would be the next best thing to help cure my boredom. I'm well read and well spoken, so you should be as well though you must also have a good sense of humour. If you're looking to get into my knickers, you can forget it as I don't believe you'll fit (There's a rather lame attempt to demonstrate my sense of humour).
In all seriousness if you're in a similar predicament to myself, send me a message but don't bother mentioning your height, weight, profession etc as I really couldn't care less.
